50#ifndef AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_H
51#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_H
52
53#ifdef __cplusplus
54extern "C"
55{
56#endif
57
58#define MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_PARTNUM_PN_M 0xFF000000
59#define MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_PARTNUM_PN_S 24
60
61#define APOLLO330P_A0 \
62 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
63 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) == \
64 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_A) | \
65 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV0)))
66
67#define APOLLO330P_GE_A0 \
68 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
69 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) >= \
70 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_A) | \
71 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV0)))
72
73#define APOLLO330P_GT_A0 \
74 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
75 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) > \
76 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_A) | \
77 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV0)))
78
79#define A0_TRIMVER_1 1
80#define A0_TRIMVER_2 2
81
82#define APOLLO330P_A0_TRIMVER1 (APOLLO330P_A0 && (g_ui32TrimVer == A0_TRIMVER_1))
83#define APOLLO330P_A0_GE_TRIMVER1 (APOLLO330P_A0 && (g_ui32TrimVer >= A0_TRIMVER_1))
84#define APOLLO330P_A0_LE_TRIMVER1 (APOLLO330P_A0 && (g_ui32TrimVer <= A0_TRIMVER_1))
85
86#define APOLLO330P_A0_TRIMVER2 (APOLLO330P_A0 && (g_ui32TrimVer == A0_TRIMVER_2))
87#define APOLLO330P_A0_GE_TRIMVER2 (APOLLO330P_A0 && (g_ui32TrimVer >= A0_TRIMVER_2))
88#define APOLLO330P_A0_LE_TRIMVER2 (APOLLO330P_A0 && (g_ui32TrimVer <= A0_TRIMVER_2))
89
90//*****************************************************************************
91//
92// MCUCTRL specific definitions.
93//
94//*****************************************************************************
95// Define the size of fields derived from the PARTNUM register
96#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_NV_SIZE_N (_FLD2VAL(MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_MRAMSIZE, 0xFFFFFFFF) + 1)
97#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_SRAM_SIZE_N (_FLD2VAL(MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_SRAMSIZE, 0xFFFFFFFF) + 1)
98
99// Define the size of fields derived from the SKU register
100#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SKU_SSRAM_SIZE_N (_FLD2VAL(MCUCTRL_SKU_SKUSRAMSIZE, 0xFFFFFFFF) + 1)
101#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SKU_MRAM_SIZE_N (_FLD2VAL(MCUCTRL_SKU_SKUMRAMSIZE, 0xFFFFFFFF) + 1)
102
103#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CRYSTAL_IBST_DURATION 500
104

112//**************************************
113typedef enum
114{
115 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CONTROL_EXTCLK32K_ENABLE,
116 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CONTROL_EXTCLK32K_DISABLE,
117} am_hal_mcuctrl_control_e;
118
119

122//**************************************

124{

126 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_EXT32K_STATUS_XTAL,
127 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_EXT32K_STATUS_EXT_CLK,
128}am_hal_mcuctrl_ext32k_status_e;

156} am_hal_mcuctrl_ssram_e;
157#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SSRAM_MAX AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SSRAM_1P75M

161//

172//

180//*****************************************************************************
181//
182// MCUCTRL data structures
183//
184//*****************************************************************************
185//**************************************
186//
188//
189//**************************************
190typedef struct
191{
192 //
194 //
195 uint32_t ui32ChipPN;
196
197 //
199 //
200 uint32_t ui32ChipID0;
201
202 //
204 //
205 uint32_t ui32ChipID1;
206
207 //
209 //
210 uint32_t ui32ChipRev;
211
212 //
214 //
215 uint32_t ui32VendorID;
216
217 //
219 //
220 uint32_t ui32SKU;
221
222 //
224 //
225 uint32_t ui32Qualified;
226
227 //
229 //
230 uint32_t ui32FlashSize;
231
232 //
234 //
235 uint32_t ui32ITCMSize;
236
237 //
239 //
240 uint32_t ui32DTCMSize;
241
242 //
244 //
245 uint32_t ui32SSRAMSize;
246
247 //
249 //
250 uint32_t ui32MRAMSize;
251
252 //
253 // JEDEC chip info
254 //
255 uint32_t ui32JedecPN;
256 uint32_t ui32JedecJEPID;
257 uint32_t ui32JedecCHIPREV;
258 uint32_t ui32JedecCID;
259} am_hal_mcuctrl_device_t;
260
261//**************************************
262//
264//
265//**************************************
266typedef struct
267{
268 bool bDebuggerLockout; // DEBUGGER
269 bool bADCcalibrated; // ADCCAL
270 bool bBattLoadEnabled; // ADCBATTLOAD
271 uint8_t bSecBootOnWarmRst; // BOOTLOADER
272 uint8_t bSecBootOnColdRst; // BOOTLOADER
273} am_hal_mcuctrl_status_t;
274
275//**************************************
276//
278//
279//**************************************
280typedef struct
281{
282 am_hal_mcuctrl_dtcm_e eDTCMSize; // DTCM Size
283 am_hal_mcuctrl_ssram_e eSharedSRAMSize; // SSRAM Size
284 am_hal_mcuctrl_mram_e eMRAMSize; // MRAM Size
285 bool bDISP; // DISP
286 bool bSupportHPMode; // HP Mode
287 bool bMIPIDSI; // MIPI/DSI
288 bool bGPU; // GPU
289 bool bUSB; // USB
290 bool bSecBootFeature; // Secure Boot
291 bool bRadioDisable; // SKURADIODISABLE
292 bool bRadioBTBLE; // SKURADIOBTBLE
293 bool bRadioBLE; // SKURADIOMM
294 bool bCM4DEBUG; // CM4 SWD
295 bool bFPU; // FPU
296 am_hal_mcuctrl_mve_e eMVECfg; // MVE
297 union // Trim version info
298 {
299 uint32_t ui32trimver;
300 struct
301 {
302 uint32_t ui8TrimVerMin : 8; // [7:0]
303 uint32_t ui8TrimVerMaj : 8; // [15:8]
304 uint32_t bTrimVerValid : 1; // [16:16] 1 if version data valid
305 uint32_t bTrimVerPCM : 1; // [17:17] 1 if PCM numbering
306 uint32_t bTrimVerRsvd18 : 6; // [23:18]
307 uint32_t bTrimVerRsvd24 : 8; // [31:24]
308 } trimver_b;
309 };
310} am_hal_mcuctrl_feature_t;
